video_description_en:
Helsinki belongs to its people â€“ not to globalists, not to Brussels, and not to illegal immigrants! Our beloved city and country are being turned into a Marxist experiment where woke insanity, taxpayer waste, and funding for outsiders come before the rights of Finnish citizens. NO MORE!

We say NO to climate hysteria that forces Finns to pay more for electricity, fuel, and housing while globalists profit. NO to punishing hard work and pouring taxpayer money into welfare systems that donâ€™t serve Finnish people. NO to collapsing security and order as crime, unrest, and illegal migration take over our streets.

My vision for Helsinki is a safe, prosperous, and well-governed city where tax revenue benefits Helsinkiâ€™s people â€“ not Brussels, not the World Economic Forum, and not failed multicultural experiments.

Itâ€™s time to bring back common sense in politics! Finns deserve safety, affordable housing, and the freedom to live without endless tax hikes and political decay. Helsinki doesnâ€™t need woke ideology or socialist economic policies â€“ we need honest work, strong leadership, and policies that put Finns first.

Vote Nico Giansanti if you want Helsinki to be safe, prosperous, and rational again. Finland first, Helsinki first â€“ and that means YOU!
